page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT STATISTICS
page.content: Most of the employed are farm workers on the Estates of Linkenholt and Faccombe. Whereas in Linkenholt the employed have worked and lived a long time in the village, in Faccombe it is mostly young men with young families encouraged to move up the "farming ladder". There are 32 employed on the Faccombe estate in 7 departments (Arable, Sheep, Forestry, Shooting, Gardening, Maintainance, Domestic). Labour relations are good in both villages under Estate Managers. There is full employment, with 2 young men travelling to work in Andover from Faccombe, and in Linkenholt those not employed by the Estate are pensioners or self-employed or working in towns.
